		[ng\:cloak], [ng-cloak], [data-ng-cloak], [x-ng-cloak], .ng-cloak, .x-ng-cloak, .ng-hide {

#{{find}}



{{html:

<script src="/$$space/.files/lib/angular-1.2.0/angular.min.js"></script>
<div ng-app="cloudscalers" ng-controller="AuthenticatedSessionController">
<div class="subnavbar" ng-controller="CloudSpaceNavigatorController">

    <div class="subnavbar-inner">
        <div class="container">
            <a class="brand" href="../$$space">CloudScalers</a>
            <ul class="pull-right">
                <li><a href="../$$space/Profile" ng-cloak>{[currentUser.username]}</a> </li>
                <li>
                    <a ng-click="logout()" href="" >
                        <i class="icon-lock"></i>
                        <span>Logout</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="subnavbar-inner">
        <div class="container">
            <ul>
                <li><a href="../$$space"> <i class="icon-home"></i></a></li>
                <li class="dropdown">
                    
                    <a href="#" class="cloudspaceCollapse dropdown-toggle" ng-click="isCollapsed = !isCollapsed"><span ng-cloak>{[currentAccount.name]} / {[currentSpace.name]}</span> <b class="caret"></b></a>
                    <div persistent-dropdown ng-cloak>
                        <accordion close-others="false">
                            <accordion-group heading="{[account.name]}" ng-repeat="account in AccountCloudSpaceHierarchy" is-open="{[ account.id == currentAccount.id ]}">
                                <ul>
                                    <li ng-repeat="space in account.cloudspaces">
                                        <a href="#" ng-click="setCurrentCloudspace(space)">{[space.name]}</a>
                                    </li>
                                </ul>
                            </accordion-group>
                        </accordion>
                        <div>
                        	<ul>
                               <li>
                                  <a href="" ng-click="createNewCloudSpace()" class="create-cloudspace">New CloudSpace...</a>
                                  <a href="/$$space/FAQ#/3" class="icon-faq"></a>
                               </li>
                            </ul>
                        	
			<script type="text/ng-template" id="createNewCloudSpaceDialog.html"> 
                            <form name="form" class="form-horizontal" ng-submit="submit()">
                                <div class="modal-header">
                                    <h3>New CloudSpace</h3>
                                </div>
                                <div class="modal-body">
                   					<div class="control-group">
    									<label class="control-label" for="inputAccount">Account</label>
    									<div class="controls">
    									
    										<select ng-model="newCloudSpace.account" required ng-options="account.name for account in accounts">
    										</select>
    									
    									
      									</div>
  									</div>
                   					<div class="control-group">
    									<label class="control-label" for="inputNewCloudSpaceName">Name</label>
    									<div class="controls">
      							         	<input ng-model="newCloudSpace.name" id="inputNewCloudSpaceName" type="text" class="input-large" placeholder="Name"/>
                               			</div>
  									</div>
                                </div>
                                 <div class="modal-footer">
                                    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary ok">Ok</button>
                                    <button type="button" class="btn cancel" ng-click="cancel()">Cancel</button>
                                </div>
                                </form>
			</script>
                        	
                        	
                        	
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    
                </li>
                <li>
                    <a href="../$$space/MachineBuckets"> <i class="icon-cloud"></i>
                        <span>Machine Buckets</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
                <li>
                    <a href="../$$space/My Desktop Buckets"> <i class="icon-desktop"></i>
                        <span>Desktop Buckets</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
                <li>
                    <a href="../$$space/StorageBuckets">
                        <i class="icon-hdd"></i>
                        <span>Storage Buckets</span>
                    </a>
                </li>

            </ul>
            <ul class="pull-right">
                <li>
                    <a href="../$$space/FAQ">
                        <i class="icon-ambulance"></i>
                        <span>Docs</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
                <li class="dropdown">
                    <a href="../$$space/Profile" data-toggle="dropdown">
                        <i class="icon-cog"></i>
                        <span>
                            Settings
                            <i class=caret></i>
                        </span>
                    </a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu">
                        <li>
                            <a href="Billing">{[currentAccount.name]}</a>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            <a href="CloudSpaceSettings">{[currentSpace.name]}</a>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
    

</div>

<div class="main">
	
	<div class="main-inner">

	    <div class="container">
		<div class="row">
		}}
